long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clipboard History Manager is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enhance productivity by managing your clipboard history effectively. It provides a seamless way to save, organize, and reuse copied content with ease. Whether you're a professional, student, or casual user, this tool empowers you to access past clipboard entries anytime, without worrying about losing important information.

Key Features:

Instant History Access: Quickly view and access your last copied items right from the extension.
Multi-format Support: Supports text, URLs, and images for diverse copying needs.
Organized and Searchable: Keep your clipboard organized, with an easy-to-use search function to find exactly what you need.
Favorites and Pinning: Pin important clips for easy access or mark favorites for frequently used entries.
Privacy & Security: All data is stored locally on your device, ensuring your clipboard history remains private
Copy and Delete Options: Easily copy entries back to your clipboard or delete unwanted ones with a single click.
Enhanced Navigation: Includes "Home" and "Favorites" sections with a user-friendly interface and intuitive icon-based navigation.
Local Storage:All data is securely stored in your browser's local storage, ensuring privacy and offline accessibility.
Tooltips and Stylish UI:Enjoy a polished design with tooltips for every action, providing a smooth user experience.
Clipboard History is perfect for writers, developers, designers, and anyone who needs to keep track of multiple copied items. Enhance your productivity and keep your workflow smooth with Clipboard History.

Clipboard History Manager is an essential tool for anyone who frequently works with text and needs an efficient way to manage their clipboard history. Simplify your workflow and enhance productivity today!
